visualperception.sentence: Mapping five key perceptual mechanisms used in node-link diagrams and adjacency matrices
visualperception.venue: IEEE Transactions on Visualization and Computer Graphics (TVCG)

freeforminterface.sentence: Supporting multiple capacitive sensing touchpoints with a single-wire connection

annotation.sentence: Exploring how annotations can be more tightly integrated into the design process of creating sonifications and physicalization
